languages.text: "Не знаю. Он ждал вас для сожжения тела еретички и завершения торжества — под конвоем Арбитес. Но когда погасло светило и из всех щелей полезли враги, он поддался страху и бежал. Зря, с нами ему было бы безопаснее".

"I do not know. He waited for you — under Arbites escort — to burn the heretic's body and conclude the ceremony. But when the sun went out and enemies came at us from every crack in the rockcrete, he panicked and ran. Not the smartest choice — he would have been safer with us."
languages.original_text: "Не знаю. Он ждал вас для сожжения тела еретички и завершения торжества — под конвоем Арбитес. Но когда погасло светило и из всех щелей полезли враги, он поддался страху и бежал. Зря, с нами ему было бы безопаснее".

traits.locale_text: "I do not know. He waited for you — under Arbites escort — to burn the heretic's body and conclude the ceremony. But when the sun went out and enemies came at us from every crack in the rockcrete, he panicked and ran. Not the smartest choice — he would have been safer with us."

"I do not know. He waited for you — under Arbites escort — to burn the heretic's body and conclude the ceremony. But when the sun went out and enemies came at us from every crack in the rockcrete, he panicked and ran. Not the smartest choice — he would have been safer with us."

"I do not know. He waited for you — under Arbites escort — to burn the heretic's body and conclude the ceremony. But when the sun went out and enemies came at us from every crack in the rockcrete, he panicked and ran. Not the smartest choice — he would have been safer with us."

"I do not know. He waited for you — under Arbites escort — to burn the heretic's body and conclude the ceremony. But when the sun went out and enemies came at us from every crack in the rockcrete, he panicked and ran. Not the smartest choice — he would have been safer with us."

"I do not know. He waited for you — under Arbites escort — to burn the heretic's body and conclude the ceremony. But when the sun went out and enemies came at us from every crack in the rockcrete, he panicked and ran. Not the smartest choice — he would have been safer with us."

"I do not know. He waited for you — under Arbites escort — to burn the heretic's body and conclude the ceremony. But when the sun went out and enemies came at us from every crack in the rockcrete, he panicked and ran. Not the smartest choice — he would have been safer with us."

languages.text: "Das weiß ich nicht. Er hat auf Euch gewartet – mit einer Eskorte des Arbites –, um die Leiche des Ketzers zu verbrennen und die Zeremonie abzuschließen. Aber als die Sonne erlosch und sich aus allen Ritzen Feinde auf uns stürzten, geriet er in Panik und ist geflohen. Keine sonderlich kluge Entscheidung. Bei uns wäre er sicherer gewesen."
languages.original_text: "I do not know. He waited for you — under Arbites escort — to burn the heretic's body and conclude the ceremony. But when the sun went out and enemies came at us from every crack in the rockcrete, he panicked and ran. Not the smartest choice — he would have been safer with us."

traits.locale_text: "Das weiß ich nicht. Er hat auf Euch gewartet – mit einer Eskorte des Arbites –, um die Leiche des Ketzers zu verbrennen und die Zeremonie abzuschließen. Aber als die Sonne erlosch und sich aus allen Ritzen Feinde auf uns stürzten, geriet er in Panik und ist geflohen. Keine sonderlich kluge Entscheidung. Bei uns wäre er sicherer gewesen."

languages.text: « Je ne sais pas. Il vous a {mf|attendu|attendue}, avec une escorte de l'Arbites, pour brûler le corps de l'hérétique et achever la cérémonie. Mais il a paniqué et s'est enfui quand le soleil s'est couché et que des ennemis ont surgi de la moindre fissure du rocbéton. Une décision très imprudente. Il aurait été plus en sécurité avec nous. »
languages.original_text: "I do not know. He waited for you — under Arbites escort — to burn the heretic's body and conclude the ceremony. But when the sun went out and enemies came at us from every crack in the rockcrete, he panicked and ran. Not the smartest choice — he would have been safer with us."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne sais pas. Il vous a {mf|attendu|attendue}, avec une escorte de l'Arbites, pour brûler le corps de l'hérétique et achever la cérémonie. Mais il a paniqué et s'est enfui quand le soleil s'est couché et que des ennemis ont surgi de la moindre fissure du rocbéton. Une décision très imprudente. Il aurait été plus en sécurité avec nous. »

languages.text: «Lo ignoro. Le estuvo esperando, bajo escolta del Arbites, para quemar el cadáver del hereje y concluir la ceremonia. Pero cuando se puso el sol y los enemigos brotaron hasta de debajo de las piedras, sucumbió al pánico y huyó. Fue una decisión muy poco acertada; con nosotros habría estado más seguro».
languages.original_text: "I do not know. He waited for you — under Arbites escort — to burn the heretic's body and conclude the ceremony. But when the sun went out and enemies came at us from every crack in the rockcrete, he panicked and ran. Not the smartest choice — he would have been safer with us."

traits.locale_text: «Lo ignoro. Le estuvo esperando, bajo escolta del Arbites, para quemar el cadáver del hereje y concluir la ceremonia. Pero cuando se puso el sol y los enemigos brotaron hasta de debajo de las piedras, sucumbió al pánico y huyó. Fue una decisión muy poco acertada; con nosotros habría estado más seguro».

languages.text: “我不清楚。在此之前，他在法务官的监督下，等待你烧毁异端分子的尸体，完成仪式。然而，当恒星熄灭，敌人从岩凝土的每条缝隙朝我们涌过来的时候，他便惊慌失措地逃跑了。那并不是个明智的选择，他和我们在一起会更安全。”
languages.original_text: "I do not know. He waited for you — under Arbites escort — to burn the heretic's body and conclude the ceremony. But when the sun went out and enemies came at us from every crack in the rockcrete, he panicked and ran. Not the smartest choice — he would have been safer with us."

traits.locale_text: “我不清楚。在此之前，他在法务官的监督下，等待你烧毁异端分子的尸体，完成仪式。然而，当恒星熄灭，敌人从岩凝土的每条缝隙朝我们涌过来的时候，他便惊慌失措地逃跑了。那并不是个明智的选择，他和我们在一起会更安全。”

languages.text: 「分かりません。彼はあなたを待っていました。高等裁定局の護衛のもと、異端者の遺体を焼き、儀式を締めくくるために。しかし太陽が消え、ロッククレートの隙間から敵が押し寄せてくると、彼は取り乱して逃げ出しました。賢い選択とは言えませんね。私たちと一緒にいたほうが、よほど安全だったのに」
languages.original_text: "I do not know. He waited for you — under Arbites escort — to burn the heretic's body and conclude the ceremony. But when the sun went out and enemies came at us from every crack in the rockcrete, he panicked and ran. Not the smartest choice — he would have been safer with us."

traits.locale_text: 「分かりません。彼はあなたを待っていました。高等裁定局の護衛のもと、異端者の遺体を焼き、儀式を締めくくるために。しかし太陽が消え、ロッククレートの隙間から敵が押し寄せてくると、彼は取り乱して逃げ出しました。賢い選択とは言えませんね。私たちと一緒にいたほうが、よほど安全だったのに」

languages.text: "Bilmiyorum. Arbites'in refakatinde sizi bekliyordu. Kâfirin bedenini yakıp töreni tamamlayasınız diye. Ancak güneş gökyüzünde parladığında kayatonun her deliğinden düşmanlar fırlayıp bizi gafil avladı. Vali de panikleyip kaçtı. Akıllıca bir hareket olmayabilir ama muhtemelen şu an bizden daha güvendedir."
languages.original_text: "I do not know. He waited for you — under Arbites escort — to burn the heretic's body and conclude the ceremony. But when the sun went out and enemies came at us from every crack in the rockcrete, he panicked and ran. Not the smartest choice — he would have been safer with us."

traits.locale_text: "Bilmiyorum. Arbites'in refakatinde sizi bekliyordu. Kâfirin bedenini yakıp töreni tamamlayasınız diye. Ancak güneş gökyüzünde parladığında kayatonun her deliğinden düşmanlar fırlayıp bizi gafil avladı. Vali de panikleyip kaçtı. Akıllıca bir hareket olmayabilir ama muhtemelen şu an bizden daha güvendedir."
